Title: "Scorpion's Tail" by Gregory Mone

In this intriguing detective novel, the main character, Sam Archer, is an ex-Navy SEAL turned private investigator. Sam is tasked with finding the perpetrator who has been using a sophisticated method to steal credit card information.

The story unfolds as Sam delves deeper into the world of cybercrime, uncovering a complex and dangerous network.
